keyMoments.title: White Berets Arrive at Lovely Street
keyMoments.description: Captain McKinley and the White Berets arrive at Lovely Street to confront the Straw Hat Pirates about their illegal entry into Skypiea.
keyMoments.significance: Lovely Street becomes the setting for the confrontation between the Straw Hats and Skypiea's law enforcement.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Hanabi Debut at Lovely Street
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts his Gomu Gomu no Hanabi technique on Lovely Street, defeating the White Berets.
keyMoments.significance: The street witnesses the first display of this new technique and the power difference between Blue Sea pirates and Sky Island soldiers.

description: A main street on Angel Island in Skypiea where shops and residents are located. The street features cloud-based architecture and is patrolled by the White Berets.

reveals.information: Lovely Street is where the White Berets confront criminals and enforce Skypiea's laws

keyMoments.title: Law Enforcement Activity on Angel Island
keyMoments.description: The White Berets patrol Angel Island and confront visitors who enter illegally, demonstrating the control Enel's forces have over the island.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Enel's oppressive system operates on Angel Island through the White Berets.

description: The main residential island of Skypiea, located in the White Sea at 10,000 meters above sea level. Angel Island is home to Skypiean citizens and is ruled by God Enel.
